name: Coop Action Game Kit
description:
This is a demo for a kit I made to sell on the Unity Asset Store, it comes with scripts and some sample art to create coop action games. As a bonus it comes with a procedural level generator I made, used in this demo to deliver "infinite" levels :)

Can be played with up to 4 players.

Instructions: Unless you pick different controls on the menu, by default it's: WASD to move and Mouse click to shoot.
